output.conclusion: By completing this course, you've taken your first steps into the world of cybersecurity. Remember to stay curious, keep learning, and practice safe online habits!
output.introduction: Welcome to Cybersecurity for Beginners! This course will introduce you to the fundamental concepts of cybersecurity and equip you with the knowledge to protect yourself online.

chapters.description: What is cybersecurity? Why is it important? An overview of threats and vulnerabilities.
Learn about malware, phishing, ransomware, and other common threats.
Basic security measures for computers, smartphones, and tablets.
Creating strong passwords and using password managers.
Identifying phishing emails and avoiding email scams.
Tips for browsing the internet safely and avoiding malicious websites.
Protecting your privacy on social media platforms.
Securing your Wi-Fi network and using public Wi-Fi safely.
Backing up your data and preparing for data loss.
